title: Test Card Schema
description: The Schmea for the add image section of the test card generator

grid.description: The coordiantes of the location to be added, a->p is the x axis, 0->9 are the allowed y axis parameters. Alternativley an alias can be used if already declared

type.description: This to be labelled as "builtin.addimage", so that the json is correctly configured

imageFill.description: This describes the scaling method for the image

image.description: The complete filename and location of the file to be added only 16 bit tiff and png files are permitted

imagesize.description: The width and height of the image in pixels, if left empty then the original image size is used. If the size is changed the there may be slight changes due to interpolation of the new image size

position.description: The x y location of image in pixels, where 0,0 is in the top left point of the image, if left empty then it is added to the top left of the testcard.

png.description: The complete filename and location of the file to be added

location.description: The location of the module to be added to the test card

alias.description: The name to refer to the chosen grid location for the module, these are reset for each section in the array and are optional
